RelatedSentence: INDIANAPOLIS ( AP ) - Dallas Mavericks owner and Shark Tank reality star Mark Cuban will serve as the honorary starter of this year 's Indianapolis 500 .
The Indianapolis Motor Speedway announced Monday that Cuban will wave the green flag to start the field of 33 drivers at the 98th running of the race on Sunday .

The Indianapolis Motor Speedway announced Monday that Cuban will wave the green flag to start the field of 33 drivers at the 98th running of the race on Sunday .
The 55 - year - old Cuban is a graduate of Indiana University and has owned the Mavericks since 2000 .
He joined ABC 's Shark Tank in 2010 .
Cuban says he 's excited to return to Indiana to participate in the race .
